Text.Name: God2_Dan
Text.Desc: Fully comprehend the ways of the Heavens after surviving heavenly tribulation. Once you have reached an elite level of alchemy, you come to understand how the way of heavens can be harnessed in order to create divine elixirs.

Text.Name: God2_Fabao
Text.Desc: Fully comprehend the ways of the Heavens after surviving heavenly tribulation. Once you have reached an elite level in your artifact crafting, you come to understand how the way of heavens can be harnessed to aid your efforts.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly increases the Success Rate of crafting Grand Artifacts.\nSignificantly reduces speed of Artifact crafting.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong1_Esoterica_1
Text.Desc: Visualize a gushing spring in a sun-dappled forest, calming and enhancing your mind. Performing such Qi training allows one to strengthen their connections to the earth around them as well as the Heavens, improving Qi absorption.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Improves Mental State.\nIncreases efficiency of Qi Absorption.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong1_Esoterica_2
Text.Desc: A technique to control one's Qi, as recorded in Sixteen Supreme Steps Law. The chant emphasizes how Qi flows should be harnessed and controlled by one's mind, as the tides are by the moon. Greatly enhances the power of one's Secret Moves.

Text.Name: Gong1_Esoterica_3
Text.Desc: A mystical chant that details the technique of utilizing wind forces to fly upon one's sword.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Flying Speed in adventures.\nImproves your Bladeriding abilities.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong1_Esoterica_4
Text.Desc: A secret technique that absorbs and combines both positive and negative Qi from the mortal world and the Heavens.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Slightly increases Spell Power.\nSlightly increases Max Qi.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong1_Esoterica_5
Text.Desc: Focus the Qi within your body and enhance its power, causing it to surge like a raging river between your meridians. Releases the limits of your core, where one gathers their Qi. Become a master cultivator, and you shall be able to gather Qi not just in your core but throughout your entire body.

Text.Name: Gong1_Esoterica_6
Text.Desc: Concentrate your energies and call upon the primal force of water, reinforcing your total energy reserves. Practicing this skill improves one's foundational understanding, greatly raising Max Qi.

Text.Name: Gong1_Esoterica_7
Text.Desc: Supplement your inner stamina with the primal force of water, strengthening and invigorating your entire being. Practicing this skill significantly increases one's Constitution.

Text.Name: Gong1_Esoterica_8
Text.Desc: Supplement your meridians with the primal force of water, strengthening and invigorating your entire being. Practicing this skill significantly increases one's Charisma and efficiency of Qi Absorption.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Charisma by 10%.\nSignificantly increases Qi absorption efficiency.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong1_Esoterica_9
Text.Desc: Supplement your mental faculties with the primal force of water, strengthening and invigorating your entire being. Practicing this skill significantly improves one's Intelligence.

Text.Name: Gong2_Esoterica_1
Text.Desc: An essential part of the foundational training given at Mt. Sunshade. Condition your body, tempering and bolstering your natural strength.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Perception by 5%.
Increases Constitution by 5%.
Slightly increases Max Qi.
Slightly increases the Success Rate of Artifact crafting.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong2_Esoterica_2
Text.Desc: A method of refining materials using Qi. Practicing this technique improves your Artifact crafting skills.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases quality of Artifacts crafted.\nIncreases the Success Rate of Artifact crafting.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong2_Esoterica_3
Text.Desc: Manifest the fires of fate and refine them within your body, to be released when necessary.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly increases Temperature Tolerance.\nSignificantly increases Spell Power.\nSignificantly improves Success Rate of Artifact crafting.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong2_Esoterica_4
Text.Desc: Utilize a secret technique to kindle primal flames within your body, cleansing your spirit.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly improves Success Rate of Artifact crafting.\nIncreases quality of crafted Artifacts.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong2_Esoterica_5
Text.Desc: Learn to concentrate and flare your mental reserves, increasing your magical power.

Text.Name: Gong2_Esoterica_6
Text.Desc: Draw in primal Qi and cultivate it, amassing a store of pure energy. Improves Qi Sense.

Text.Name: Gong2_Esoterica_7
Text.Desc: A reference work that details the physical characteristics of various materials commonly found throughout China. Improves Success Rate of Artifact crafting.

Text.Name: Gong2_Esoterica_8
Text.Desc: A beginner's guide to Artifact crafting, with a large reader base throughout the world of cultivators.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Increases speed of Artifact crafting.
Increases Success Rate of Artifact crafting.
Improves tier of Artifacts crafted.
Increases quality of Artifacts crafted.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong2_Esoterica_9
Text.Desc: Explains techniques for treating Artifacts, which can help to greatly improve their tiers.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Improves tier of Artifacts crafted.\nIncreases the Success Rate of Artifact crafting.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong2_Esoterica_10
Text.Desc: Artifact crafting techniques passed down exclusively by the Avarice Sect. Combining notes on the physical properties of countless materials into one invaluable guidebook, it is regarded as the holy grail of artisan craftmanship manuals.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly increases speed of Artifact crafting.
Significantly increases the Success Rate of Artifact crafting.
Significantly improves tier of Artifacts crafted.
Significantly increases quality of Artifacts crafted.

Acquire Talismans: 
Talisman of Riches
Wonder Talisman[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_1
Text.Desc: An elementary requirement for embarking upon the Seven-Slaughtering Sword. Accept the finality of death, and increase Artifact Power.

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_2
Text.Desc: Control your killing intent to imbue your meridians with the strength of the Seven-Slaughtering. Significantly improves Constitution. You also learn how to create Blade Pill.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Constitution by 20%.\nSlightly increases Max Qi.\nAcquire Elixir Recipe: Blade Pill[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_3
Text.Desc: A sword skill of the Seven-Slaughtering Sect. In creating it, a demon was fed wicked swords that had slain heroes in battle, before being controlled by their auras. Fully enhances one's Artifact Mastery powers.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Artifact Power.
Increases Artifact Qi recovery rate.
Increases Artifact Qi.
Increases Artifact Speed.
Increases Artifact turn speed.
Increases length of Artifact trails.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_4
Text.Desc: A foundational artifact mastery skill recorded in the Seven-Slaughtering Sword. Wielding artifacts through this method can allow one to stimulate the activity of one's meridians.

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_5
Text.Desc: One must be dedicated to the sword, and pay other distractions no mind. This is the Blade Oath.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Improves Mental State.
Greatly increases Artifact Power.
Greatly increases Artifact Speed.
Greatly increases Artifact turn speed.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_6
Text.Desc: The sword is linked with your inner being, a part of your mind, as if you were born with it.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Improves Mental State.
Greatly increases Artifact Power.
Greatly increases Artifact Qi.
Greatly increases Artifact Qi recovery rate.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_7
Text.Desc: Realize the full potential of your Sword Aura, by focusing entirely upon the spirit of the blade itself.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Improves Mental State.
Greatly increases Artifact Power.
Greatly increases Artifact Speed.
Greatly increases Artifact turn speed.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_8
Text.Desc: Become one with the sword, and let it fill your entire being.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Improves Mental State.
Greatly increases Artifact Power.
Greatly increases Artifact Qi.
Greatly increases Artifact Qi recovery rate.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_9
Text.Desc: You devote your existence to the sword, to the extent that nothing else matters. This significantly improves mental state and speed of artifacts.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly improves Mental State.\nSignificantly increases Artifact Speed.\nSignificantly increases Artifact turn speed.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_10
Text.Desc: The final method of combining one's primal spirit with that of the sword. Significantly improves one's mental state and their artifact Qi.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly improves Mental State.\nSignificantly increases Artifact Qi.\nSignificantly increases Artifact Qi recovery rate.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_11
Text.Desc: A secret technique used in swordsmanship training, recorded in the Seven-Slaughtering Sword. Requires many years of practice to master.

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_12
Text.Desc: A secret technique used in swordsmanship training, recorded in the Seven-Slaughtering Sword. Requires many years of practice to master.

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_13
Text.Desc: A secret technique used in swordsmanship training, recorded in the Seven-Slaughtering Sword. Requires many years of practice to master.

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_14
Text.Desc: A secret technique used in swordsmanship training, recorded in the Seven-Slaughtering Sword. Requires many years of practice to master.

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_15
Text.Desc: A secret technique used in swordsmanship training, recorded in the Seven-Slaughtering Sword. Requires many years of practice to master.

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_16
Text.Desc: A secret technique used in swordsmanship training, recorded in the Seven-Slaughtering Sword. Requires many years of practice to master.

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_17
Text.Desc: A secret technique used in swordsmanship training, recorded in the Seven-Slaughtering Sword. Requires many years of practice to master.

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_18
Text.Desc: A secret technique used in swordsmanship training, recorded in the Seven-Slaughtering Sword. Requires many years of practice to master.

Text.Name: Gong3_Esoterica_19
Text.Desc: A secret technique used in swordsmanship training, recorded in the Seven-Slaughtering Sword. Requires many years of practice to master.

Text.Name: Gong4_Esoterica_1
Text.Desc: A hidden method that hails from the Kunlun Palace, it can increase one's meridian activity and massively expand their Qi reserves.

Text.Name: Gong4_Esoterica_2
Text.Desc: By aligning yourself with the movement of the Heavens, you learn to attune yourself to natural vibrations, significantly improving your fortune.

Text.Name: Gong4_Esoterica_3
Text.Desc: A technique that the Jadesprite Sect keeps secret. Through this chant, one can begin to understand the mysteries behind Qi flows.

Text.Name: Gong4_Esoterica_4
Text.Desc: The once-lost powers of the Five Elements return to your core, residing within the Five Organs, and harmonizing inner Qi. Serves to prolong one's lifespan, increase Qi and greatly improve Qi absorption efficiency.

Text.Name: Gong4_Esoterica_5
Text.Desc: Thoroughly re-examine and comprehend all that you have learned and witnessed in your efforts to solve the mysteries of the Heavens. Reduces Attainment without affecting actual strength.

Text.Name: Gong4_Esoterica_6
Text.Desc: She bestow the artifact with to us life; an escape from death: hence, we know her as the Goddess of the Grain. With this, one can greatly prolong their Lifespan as well as increase their Qi capacity.

Text.Name: Gong4_Esoterica_7
Text.Desc: A matter kept secret by the Jadesprite School, one can become endowed with a primeval consciousness, the Innerspirit, that allows for greater Qi manipulation abilities. In doing so, you greatly enhance the Innerspirit's abilities to interact and draw upon external Qi sources.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly increases Qi recovery rate.\nIncreases Spell Power.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong4_Esoterica_8
Text.Desc: Cultivate one's cognitive capabilities, increasing Perception and significantly increasing Artifact power. It also allows one to utilize the way of Lustrous as the catalyst to split out one branch of sub-spirit.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Perception by 10%.\nIncreases Artifact Power.\nGains one sub-spirit.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong4_Esoterica_9
Text.Desc: Instill within one's mind the resilience of legendary oaks, reputed to possess immortality-granting sap, increasing one's Constitution and significantly prolonging Lifespan. It also allows one to utilize the way of Exuberant as the catalyst to split out one branch of sub-spirit.

Text.Name: Gong4_Esoterica_10
Text.Desc: One's Qi flows with the strength of the Hallowed Cascade, waters within a sacred channel that dates back to the dawn of time. Increases Charisma and Max Qi. It also allows one to utilize the way of Cascade as the catalyst to split out one branch of sub-spirit.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Charisma by 10%.\nIncreases Max Qi.\nGains one sub-spirit.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong4_Esoterica_11
Text.Desc: Embrace the forces of the Fervent Spirit, granting you both clarity and power to increase Intelligence and Spell Power. It also allows one to utilize the way of Fervent as the catalyst to split out one branch of sub-spirit.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Intelligence by 10%.\nIncreases Spell Power.\nGains one sub-spirit.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong4_Esoterica_12
Text.Desc: Within the earth lies a force dating back to antiquity that protects those who draw upon its power, granting good fortune and strengthening Qi Shields. It also allows one to utilize the way of Grim as the catalyst to split out one branch of sub-spirit.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Luck by 10%.\nIncreases Qi Barrier Effect.\nGains one sub-spirit.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong5_Esoterica_1
Text.Desc: A dark method of cultivation recorded in the Heaven Stealing Law. Slightly improve Constitution by mutilating one's appearance.

Text.Name: Gong5_Esoterica_2
Text.Desc: A dark method of cultivation recorded in the Heaven Stealing Law. Slightly improve Constitution by damaging one's own sensory abilities.

Text.Name: Gong5_Esoterica_3
Text.Desc: A dark method of cultivation recorded in the Heaven Stealing Law. Slightly improve Constitution by damaging one's own sanity.

Text.Name: Gong5_Esoterica_4
Text.Desc: A dark method of cultivation recorded in the Heaven Stealing Law. Slightly improve Constitution at the cost of one's Luck.

Text.Name: Gong5_Esoterica_5
Text.Desc: Having suffered the Four Defilements of Image, Senses, Mind and Sanity, the truly corrupt ones may attract the Qi emanating from the Nether to rejuvenate their broken spirits, prolonging their lifespans.

Text.Name: Gong5_Esoterica_6
Text.Desc: A mysterious practice in which the heart and bone tissue is reformed, processing not just blood cells but also Qi as it flows endlessly throughout your body.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly increases Qi recovery rate.\nSlightly increases Max Qi.\nDamages the heart![/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong5_Esoterica_7
Text.Desc: A protection founded by cultivators of times past, culminating from their experiences in countless battles. Enhances one's ability to resist damage.

Text.Name: Gong5_Esoterica_8
Text.Desc: A chant formed over many millennia and handed down over the years. Study and reproduce the breathing techniques of wizened turtles, granting longevity and health.

Text.Name: Gong5_Esoterica_9
Text.Desc: Enter a form of spiritual hibernation in which you become hidden from all, even the watchful eye of the Heavens. Practicing this skill can serve to greatly prolong one's life.

Text.Name: Gong5_Esoterica_10
Text.Desc: Passed down over the ages, this method can allow one to delay the arrival of Heavenly Tribulations for a considerable time.

Text.Name: Gong5_Esoterica_11
Text.Desc: Passed down over the ages. Exploit the ways of the Heavens, multiplying your base lifespan by 5.

Text.Name: Gong5_Esoterica_12
Text.Desc: Plunder the might of the Heavens to greatly prolong your own life.

Text.Name: Gong6_Esoterica_1
Text.Desc: Used in foundational Taoist Qi training. Through strengthening the cycles of Qi in your body, you expel impurities and increase your maximum Qi.

Text.Name: Gong6_Esoterica_2
Text.Desc: Through mindfulness and harmony you put your mind at ease, improving Intelligence.

Text.Name: Gong6_Esoterica_3
Text.Desc: An ultimate Taoist method. Cultivate your morality and ethical codes to perfection, and achieve a tranquility in both heart and soul. Having cultivated this ability one enjoys a superior mental state as a result.

Text.Name: Gong6_Esoterica_4
Text.Desc: A Taoist volume that describes and details a range of basic elixirs. A thorough readthrough imparts a greater understanding of Alchemy upon the reader.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Alchemy Success Rate.
Acquire Elixir Recipes: 
Forming Pill
Curative Pill
Cure Powder
Euphoria Pill
Inedia Pill
Purity Pill[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong6_Esoterica_5
Text.Desc: Read this book for an insight into the medicinal properties of almost every herb and mineral under the Heavens, greatly improving your Alchemy skills.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Alchemy Success Rate.
Increases Alchemy Speed.
Acquire Elixir Recipes: 
Metallic Pill
Earth Pill
Fire Powder
Metal Pill
Water Pill[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong6_Esoterica_6
Text.Desc: An anthology of concoction recipes, compiled by the Elixir Sages. Within its covers one can find thousands of years of the best scholarship on Taoist alchemy.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Acquire the following elixir recipes: 
Sun Pill
Thought Pill
Sprout Pill
Resin Essence Powder
Life Pill
Vitata Elixir
Samsara Pill
Divine Powder

Acquire Talismans: 
Tusita Talisman
Impermanence Talisman

Significantly increases Alchemy yield.
Significantly increases Alchemy Success Rate.
Increases Alchemy Speed.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong6_Esoterica_7
Text.Desc: Train your eyes according to the Secret Laws of cultivation and improve Perception.

Text.Name: Gong6_Esoterica_8
Text.Desc: The nine methods of finalizing and refining concocted elixirs. Essential knowledge for all alchemists passed down by their predecessors that greatly improves one's Alchemy success.

Text.Name: Gong6_Esoterica_9
Text.Desc: A concoction method kept secret by the Elixir Sage Sect that makes the more time-consuming recipes less painful to carry out. By cultivating this method one can greatly increase the speed at which they perform Alchemy.

Text.Name: Gong6_Esoterica_10
Text.Desc: A concoction method kept secret by the Elixir Sage Sect that improves one's alchemic efficiency. By cultivating this method one can greatly increase their Alchemy yield.

Text.Name: Gong6_Esoterica_11
Text.Desc: A concoction method kept secret by the Elixir Sage Sect that allows one to improve in their craft, greatly increasing the success experienced when concocting elixirs.

Text.Name: Gong6_Esoterica_12
Text.Desc: Collect the essence of the Hedyotis herb to provide the body with bountiful nutrients. Increases Constitution.

Text.Name: Gong6_Esoterica_13
Text.Desc: A secondary, advanced equivalent of the Essence Chant. Reconsume the essential nutrients imbibed to extract their maximum medicinal value, increasing one's maximum Qi and Qi absorption efficiency.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Max Qi.\nIncreases efficiency of Qi Absorption.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong6_Esoterica_14
Text.DisplayName: Inner Canon of the Elixir Sages
Text.Desc: The most in-depth analysis and studies of the human body, as conducted by the Elixir Sage Sect. Can serve to prolong one's lifespan significantly.

Text.Name: Gong7_Esoterica_1
Text.Desc: A form of mental ascetism in which one restrain their thoughts, which can improve basic mood values and speed up cultivation.

Text.Name: Gong7_Esoterica_2
Text.Desc: Focus your mind on the grass and the trees, the gentle might of the rivers and mountains. Feel the stillness of nature, becoming impervious to the winds and the rains. Through practice, you can slightly increase Charisma and improve your Mental State.

Text.Name: Gong7_Esoterica_3
Text.Desc: Become telepathically attuned to the consciousness of those around you, the birds in the sky, the people you meet. Experience the comings and goings of a thousand souls. This method greatly improves one's Charisma and Social skills, as well as nurturing a sense of Empathy that boosts their flows of Qi.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Charisma by 10%.\nSignificantly increases Social skills.\nSignificantly increases Max Qi.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong7_Esoterica_4
Text.Desc: Embrace the torrent of emotion that emanates from the world around you until you become tolerant to them, and they no longer overwhelm you. View this mortal plane with an unyielding heart, and gain an acceptance of all around you.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly increases base Mood value.\nBecome impervious to pain.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong7_Esoterica_5
Text.Desc: Utilize the Longevity Chant to remold your physical form, greatly improving Constitution and Natural Resilience.

Text.Name: Gong7_Esoterica_6
Text.Desc: Details miraculous techniques to condition both body and mind. Improves Charisma and max Qi.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Charisma by 10%.\nGreatly increases Max Qi.\nIncreases Artifact Power.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong7_Esoterica_7
Text.Desc: A practice for refining one's Qi, created by the Skydome Palace. Through devoted cultivation with this method, one can enhance their mental faculties and speed up cultivation.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases base Mental State value.\nIncreases Cultivation Speed.\nIncreases Artifact Power.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong7_Esoterica_8
Text.Desc: A wondrous tome passed down the generations, once penned by ancient immortals. It can help develop potential of various meridian points around the body, greatly prolonging one's life.

Text.Name: Gong7_Esoterica_9
Text.Desc: Amass one's spiritual power within the body, and have it flow freely as the wind. Grants a freeness and cloud-like fluidity in both mind and body. Mastering this grants a great increase in one's Max Qi and hugely improves Charisma.

Text.Name: Gong7_Esoterica_10
Text.Desc: The ultimate skill taught in the Elixir Sages' 'Way of Oblivion'. Find your true self, as you cut off all ties to the mortal world. Enormously increases Cultivation Speed. Significantly increases power of Artifact Mastery if used on a sword skill.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly increases Cultivation Speed.\nSignificantly increases Artifact Power.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong7_Esoterica_11
Text.Desc: Mastery allows one to read the hearts of others. An adaptable and powerful ability.

Text.Name: Gong7_Esoterica_12
Text.Desc: Amalgamate the seven emotions of mankind, conferring them upon your blade. Doing so greatly enhances one's Bladeriding agility, yet the gravity of such strong emotions also serve to slow Bladeriding recovery times.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Max Artifact Qi.\nReduces Artifact Qi recovery rate.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong7_Esoterica_13
Text.Desc: Focus and seal the most heavy and potent emotions within an Artifact to have it fly at breakneck speed, slaying all in its Law.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly increases Artifact Power.\nSignificantly increases Artifact Speed.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong8_Esoterica_1
Text.Desc: These records detail meditation techniques in which one visualizes the Perfected Warrior, god of the Grand Chariot. It also forms a foundation for the Law of Strife. Practicing the methods mentioned within can illuminate one's mind and aid their understanding of various spiritual matters.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Improves Mental State.\nIncreases Intelligence by 10%.\nIncreases Artifact Power.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong8_Esoterica_2
Text.Desc: Expounds upon the ways to harness the power of the stars and constellations in tempering the self. It is also sets the outline for the Seven Ultimate Skills of the Perfected Warrior. Cultivating such skills allows one to improve Constitution via the power of the Grand Chariot.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Constitution by 10%.
Increases Max Qi.
Increases Max Artifact Qi.
Increases Artifact Qi recovery rate.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong8_Esoterica_3
Text.Desc: Draw upon the power of the Grand Chariot star Dubhe for your own use. The glowing light of Dubhe, bristling with a certain killing intent, can be assimilated into Artifacts to greatly enhance their power.

Text.Name: Gong8_Esoterica_4
Text.Desc: Draw upon the power of the Grand Chariot star Merak for your own use. The glowing light of Merak, twinkling with a deft agility, can be assimilated into Artifacts to give them a wind-like swiftness.

Text.Name: Gong8_Esoterica_5
Text.Desc: Draw upon the power of the Grand Chariot star Phegda for your own use. The glowing light of Phegda, emanating a sense of honor and splendor, can be assimilated into Artifacts to repel evils.

Text.Name: Gong8_Esoterica_6
Text.Desc: Draw upon the power of the Grand Chariot star Megrez for your own use. The glowing light of Megrez, ancient and just, can be assimilated into Artifacts to lend them an incredible solidity.

Text.Name: Gong8_Esoterica_7
Text.Desc: Draw upon the power of the Grand Chariot star Alioth for your own use. The glowing light of Alioth, shining with a tireless strength, can be assimilated into Artifacts to increase their sustainability.

Text.Name: Gong8_Esoterica_8
Text.Desc: Draw upon the power of the Grand Chariot star Mizar for your own use. The glowing light of Mizar, gleaming with a fierce vigor, can be assimilated into Artifacts to make them nigh on unstoppable.

Text.Name: Gong8_Esoterica_9
Text.Desc: Draw upon the power of the Grand Chariot star Alkaid for your own use. The glowing light of Alkaid, piercing and brilliant, can be assimilated into Artifacts to make them quick as lightning.

Text.Name: Gong8_Esoterica_10
Text.Desc: A skill with unparalleled power, it is the greatest technique of the Law of Strife.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Artifact Power.\nIncreases Artifact Speed.\nIncreases Artifact turning speed.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong8_Esoterica_11
Text.Desc: Align yourself with universal cycles of Qi. In doing so you free yourself from all ego and can find your true self. Practice this skill to promote mindfulness and improve your mental faculties overall.

Text.Name: Gong8_Esoterica_12
Text.Desc: Expend vital energies to strengthen your being, comprehensively improving the Five Attributes. While powerful, this method enhances your abilities at the cost of a tenth of your total Qi pool and 120 years of life.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Shortens Lifespan.\nGreatly decreases Max Qi.\nIncreases the Five Attributes by 5%.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong8_Esoterica_13
Text.Desc: Instill within your eyes a power that originates from the star constellations themselves. Gain increased Perception, and have a starlight pierce the darkness you see around you.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Perception by 20%.\nRemoves fog of war on map (one time).[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong9_Esoterica_1
Text.Desc: Train your vision using hidden techniques long considered extinct. Gain the ability to gaze into the hearts and minds of others around you. Practice this skill to greatly improve Perception.

Text.Name: Gong9_Esoterica_2
Text.Desc: Fall into a trance-like state, and relive the memories of this life and your past life, and foresee those of the next. With this wealth of experience, you can gradually come to comprehend your true self. Practicing this skill can speed up cultivation and encourage a more stable mental state, as you no longer fear the mysteries of life and death.

Text.Name: Gong9_Esoterica_3
Text.Desc: A secret tome that contains notes on the truths of life, death, and their myriad interconnections. Passed down through the ages from the ancient immortal Guru. Studying this volume can serve to prolong one's lifespan and enhance spell power.

Text.Name: Gong9_Esoterica_4
Text.Desc: Perform techniques outlined in the Mortality Records to trigger Genetic Transfiguration, and reform your body into a Reincarnated Form. Casting while one's body is a Reincarnated Form grants a much greater Spell Power while Qi costs remain the same.

Text.Name: Gong9_Esoterica_5
Text.Desc: By watching over the joys and sorrows as experienced over a hundred reincarnations of different souls, one's mental state becomes tempered and strengthened. Having gained an insight into countless existences, one achieves a Reincarnated Psyche.

Text.Name: Gong9_Esoterica_6
Text.Desc: A mysterious doctrine that is believed to originate from the Netherworld, and forms the basis for the Book of Reincarnation. Greatly increases one's Max Qi.

Text.Name: Gong9_Esoterica_7
Text.Desc: Harness the Qi given off from trees and the plants around you to nourish your own Qi reserves. Practicing this skill moderately improves your Constitution and Qi absorption efficiency.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Constitution by 10%.\nSlightly increases Qi Absorption Efficiency.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong9_Esoterica_8
Text.Desc: Records detailing how it is possible to attain synchrony with the natural world around us, if it is studied closely. Doing so can aid understandings of Artifacts. Through an understanding of these records one can comprehensively improve Artifact Mastery abilities.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Artifact Power.
Increases Artifact Qi recovery rate.
Increases Artifact Qi.
Increases Artifact speed.
Increases Artifact turning speed.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong9_Esoterica_9
Text.Desc: Develop the synchrony that exists between yourself and nature even further, until your very breathing is in harmony with natural Qi flows. Practice this skill to increase Max Qi and Qi recovery rate.

Text.Name: Gong9_Esoterica_10
Text.Desc: A secret technique that allows one to reshape their physical form. Practice to improve Constitution and Charisma as well as Potential.

Text.Name: Gong9_Esoterica_11
Text.Desc: Enhance one's knowledge on the cycles of reincarnation, and the ways in which they can be interceded to improve Intelligence.

Text.Name: Gong9_Esoterica_12
Text.Desc: Transform one's body into that of a celestial being, prolonging one's Lifespan, enhancing Natural Resilience and increasing Spell Power.

Text.Name: Gong9_Esoterica_13
Text.Desc: Through channeling Qi that is released during reincarnation, one can undergo training to perfect one's physical form. Greatly improves Max Qi.

Text.Name: Gong9_Esoterica_14
Text.Desc: Build upon one's prior knowledge and Qi powers to transform into a greater being, significantly improving combat ability.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Artifact Power.\nIncreases Spell Power.\nIncreases effectiveness of Qi Shield.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong10_Esoterica_1
Text.Desc: A long lost ancient codex that can bring about a fundamental improvement of one's Spell Power.

Text.Name: Gong10_Esoterica_2
Text.Desc: Through sheer power of will, have Qi rush throughout your body and increase the potency of your spells.

Text.Name: Gong10_Esoterica_3
Text.Desc: Harness Qi energies that are dispersed through sunlight, and greatly enhance Spell Power.

Text.Name: Gong10_Esoterica_4
Text.Desc: Temper your body with flames of pure energy. Hugely increases elemental properties of spells, and increases their potency.

Text.Name: Gong10_Esoterica_5
Text.Desc: Gather and concentrate your Qi by visualizing the sun in its true, primeval form. Greatly increases one's Max Qi.

Text.Name: Gong10_Esoterica_6
Text.Desc: Imbue your Five Organs with the powers of the Fervent Spirit to enhance their functions, cause a slight increase in the Five Attributes and increase Stamina conversion rates.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases each of the Five Attributes by 5%.\nIncreases Stamina Conversion Rate.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong10_Esoterica_7
Text.Desc: Refine your meridian points with a holy fire. Increases maximum Qi and slightly increases Constitution.

Text.Name: Gong10_Esoterica_8
Text.Desc: Ignite a blaze of Qi deep within your mind that burns continuously to greatly reduce casting intervals and costs.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Decreases Spell casting cooldown.\nDecreases Spells' Qi consumption.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong10_Esoterica_9
Text.Desc: A fiery technique with unmatched potency. Practice to greatly enhance spell damage.

Text.Name: Gong10_Esoterica_10
Text.Desc: Release a pure, spiritual fire upon your mind, greatly improving Intelligence.

Text.Name: Gong10_Esoterica_11
Text.Desc: Become one with the infernos of the Heavens, as the world beneath is united as one. Cultivate this skill to greatly increase Luck.

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_1
Text.Desc: Refine one's physical form using the Yin Qi energy that emanates from the light of the moon. Results in gender reversal if the cultivator practicing it is male.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Transform the energies within your body to become that of pure Yin.\nGreatly increases Max Qi.\nGreatly increases Artifact Power.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_2
Text.Desc: A form of Artifact Mastery that utilizes pure Yin energy to greatly increase Artifact speed.

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_3
Text.Desc: A secret manual that details how Earthbound forces may be used to cultivate a Qi shield.

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_4
Text.Desc: Entrust yourself to the void in order to see the gods that lay within. Significantly increases Luck and Artifact Power, and incidentally gains a sub-spirit. Such is the ultimate of the secret techniques mentioned within the Sunspirit Codex.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Luck by 20%.\nSignificantly increases Artifact Power.\nGains one sub-spirit.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_5
Text.Desc: Immerse yourself in visualizing the ancient landforms that formed China's geography, cultivating your primeval Qi. Effectively increases one's Max Qi.

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_6
Text.Desc: Harness Earthbound powers to enhance your vision, permitting you to see through illusory spellcraft that alter the world you see before you. Improves your perceptive abilities.

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_7
Text.Desc: The Earth has the four points of the compass, and the four ordinal points between them. Similarly, the human body also has eight acupoints. By refining these eight acupoints of the body, one's physical form can be effectively reformed entirely.

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_8
Text.Desc: Move with incredible speed, as if the world had been shrunk beneath you, and you covered a mile with each step.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly increases Movement Speed.\nIncreases Flying Speed in adventures.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_9
Text.Desc: One should ascertain to embody benevolence in all matters; a nobility as mighty and imposing as the oceans and mountains. Through practicing this one becomes able to overcome strife by means of their virtue and morality. Developing one's integrity in this way serves to prolong their lifespan.

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_10
Text.Desc: A swordskill that originates from deep in the Netherworld. By sacrificing artifact energies, their power can be greatly enhanced.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Artifact Power.\nGreatly decreases Max Artifact Qi.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_11
Text.Desc: A swordskill that originates from deep in the Netherworld. Capitalizing on the element of surprise, draw your weapon with a devastating swiftness.

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_12
Text.Desc: A swordskill that originates from deep in the Netherworld. Amass pure Yin energies within your blade, greatly enhancing your knockback resistance.

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_13
Text.Desc: A swordskill that originates from deep in the Netherworld. Greatly enhances Artifact power at the expense of Artifact Qi recovery rate.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Artifact Power.\nDecreases Artifact Qi recovery rate.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_14
Text.Desc: What is said to be the ultimate of the Netherworld swordskills. Grants a great increase in Artifact power.

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_15
Text.Desc: A mystic cultivation manual that describes how to command souls and spirits. Believed to have been passed down from the Palace of the Six Earth Mothers.

Text.Name: Gong11_Esoterica_16
Text.Desc: Refine a minute wisp of ancient Earthbound Qi to grant yourself an incredible increase in your own Max Qi.

Text.Name: Gong12_Esoterica_1
Text.Desc: Secret manual that recorded some common talismans required in cultivating.
Text.EffectDesc:
Unlocks Talismans: 
Talisman of Departing Shadow
Talisman of Heavenly Heart
Talisman of Tranquil Heart
Talisman of Civil Prosperity
Talisman of Military Prosperity

Text.Name: Gong12_Esoterica_2
Text.Desc: Records talismans that can improve defense capabilities.

Text.Name: Gong12_Esoterica_3
Text.Desc: Records talismans that can improve Sword Mastery.

Text.Name: Gong12_Esoterica_4
Text.Desc: Records talismans that can improve the power of Spells.

Text.Name: Gong12_Esoterica_5
Text.Desc: It records powerful Talismans that were thought to be long lost. These Talismans are capable of forcibly improving the qualification of the wearer, thus are referred to as Heavensent.

Text.Name: Gong12_Esoterica_6
Text.Desc: It is said that Talismans recorded by this book can harness the power of Heaven.

Text.Name: Gong12_Esoterica_7
Text.Desc: Talismans circulated during ancient times that were said to be drawn for the cultivation of Law of Shendao, which have been long lost.
Text.EffectDesc:
Unlocks Talismans: 
Talisman of Divine Residence
Talisman of Divine Perception
Talisman of Divine Authority
Talisman of Divine Concealment

Text.Name: Gong12_Esoterica_8
Text.Desc: A fine technique inspired by observing the evolution of cloud and smoke. Practicing it significantly increases one's Flying Speed in Adventure.

Text.Name: Gong12_Esoterica_9
Text.Desc: Unique way of managing one's circulation of inner Qi. Increases Max Qi.

Text.Name: Gong12_Esoterica_10
Text.Desc: Concentrate the Qi of your entire body into a form resembling that of a cloud, effectively improving the defensive effects of Qi Barrier.

Text.Name: Gong12_Esoterica_11
Text.Desc: In ancient times, people back then lived through more than a hundred springs and autumns, and yet their physical fitness were unhindered. Practicing of this skill can significantly improve one's Constitution and Lifespan.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Constitution by 20%, and extends Lifespan by 300 years.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong12_Esoterica_12
Text.Desc: Secret soul-splitting technique passed on by the East Wood Palace. When cultivated to extreme, it can split out a total of ten sub-spirits. Very miraculous.
